description: Wall facet object representing triangular faces of walls. Cannot be instantiated directly - obtain instances via itasca.wall.facet.list() or itasca.wall.facet.find().
instantiation: Cannot be instantiated. Obtained via itasca.wall.facet.list() or itasca.wall.facet.find()

methods.name: active
methods.description: Get the facet activity code. Codes: 0=both sides active, 1=top side active (normal direction), -1=bottom side active, 2=neither side active.

methods.name: contact_count
methods.signature: facet.contact_count(all: bool = False, type: TypeObject = None) -> int
methods.description: Get number of contacts associated with this Facet. If type is given, count is limited to specified contact types. If all is True, count includes virtual contacts.

methods.name: contacts
methods.signature: facet.contacts(piece: object = None, all: bool = False, type: TypeObject = None) -> tuple of Contact
methods.description: Get contacts associated with this Facet. Optional piece argument filters by Ball, Pebble or Facet. If type is given, list is limited to specified types. If all is True, includes virtual contacts.

parameters.name: piece
parameters.description: Filter by piece (Ball, Pebble, or Facet)

methods.name: conveyor
methods.description: Get the facet conveyor velocity.

methods.name: conveyor_x
methods.description: Get the x-component of the facet conveyor velocity.

methods.name: conveyor_y
methods.description: Get the y-component of the facet conveyor velocity.

methods.name: conveyor_z
methods.description: Get the z-component of the facet conveyor velocity.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Delete a facet. The wall position is automatically updated.

methods.name: edge_neighbors
methods.description: Get neighboring facets sharing a vertex in 2D or edge in 3D. Tuple length is 2 in 2D, 3 in 3D. Each position contains a Facet object or None if no neighbor.

methods.name: extra
methods.description: Get the facet extra data in the given slot.

methods.name: group
methods.signature: facet.group(slot: str or int = None) -> str
methods.description: Get the facet group name in a given slot.

methods.name: group_remove
methods.signature: facet.group_remove(group_name: str or int, slot: str or int = None) -> bool
methods.description: Remove from the given group from all group slots of the facet.

returns.description: True if group was removed from any slot

methods.name: groups
methods.description: Get a dictionary describing which groups this facet is part of. Keys are slot names, values are group names.

returns.description: Dictionary of slot to group name mappings

methods.name: has_prop
methods.description: Returns True if the facet has the given surface property.

methods.name: id
methods.description: Get the facet id.

methods.name: in_group
methods.signature: facet.in_group(group_name: str or int, slot: str or int = None) -> bool
methods.description: Test if the facet is part of a given group. If slot is given, only that slot is searched. Otherwise, all group slots are searched.

returns.description: True if facet is in the group

methods.name: normal
methods.description: Get the facet normal direction.

methods.name: normal_x
methods.description: Get the x-component of the facet normal direction.

methods.name: normal_y
methods.description: Get the y-component of the facet normal direction.

methods.name: normal_z
methods.description: Get the z-component of the facet normal direction.

methods.name: point_near
methods.description: Get the closest point on the facet to another point.

parameters.name: point
parameters.description: Point to find nearest location to

methods.name: pos
methods.description: Get the facet location.

methods.name: pos_x
methods.description: Get the x-component of the facet location.

methods.name: pos_y
methods.description: Get the y-component of the facet location.

methods.name: pos_z
methods.description: Get the z-component of the facet location.

methods.name: prop
methods.description: Get a surface property value of this facet.

methods.name: props
methods.description: Get a dictionary of all the surface properties of this facet.

methods.name: set_active
methods.description: Set facet activity. Codes: 0=both sides active, 1=top side active (normal direction), -1=bottom side active, 2=neither side active.

methods.name: set_conveyor
methods.description: Set the facet conveyor velocity.

methods.name: set_conveyor_x
methods.description: Set the x-component of the facet conveyor velocity.

methods.name: set_conveyor_y
methods.description: Set the y-component of the facet conveyor velocity.

methods.name: set_conveyor_z
methods.description: Set the z-component of the facet conveyor velocity.

methods.name: set_extra
methods.description: Set the facet extra data in the given slot.

methods.name: set_group
methods.signature: facet.set_group(group_name: str or int, slot: str or int = None) -> None
methods.description: Set the facet group name in a given slot.

methods.name: set_prop
methods.description: Set a surface property of this facet.

methods.name: valid
methods.description: Returns True if this facet is live.

methods.name: vertices
methods.description: Get the facet vertices.

returns.description: Tuple of WallVertex objects forming this facet

methods.name: wall
methods.description: Get the facet's wall.

returns.description: Wall object that this facet belongs to
